dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.product.prod.ProductComponent
dataStructure.description:
A ProductComponent is an instantiation of SimpleProductOffering which keeps the business terms under which the customer purchased the product (using a SimpleProductOffering).

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: ProductComponent

child.name: simpleProductOffering
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association SimpleProdOfferInstantiatedAs

This association end is optional
child.label: simpleProductOffering

child.name: productComponentUsage
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association DescribesUsageOfProductComponent

This association end is optional
child.label: productComponentUsage
